Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2010 08:15AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: thanks dmorgan and ruthbru ! well, i will not be going to the oncologist in my area. they called me the day before and told me my insurance don't cover this oncologist ! well, needless to say i was pissed ! lol ! i got mad and called the james cancer center in columbus ohio and they got me in next friday ! yay ! really quick if you ask me. you can google it but they have some of the best docs in the nation. i feel really good about it. i feel like i have accomplished something myself. they were so nice on the phone and definitly accept my insurance. i feel like i really am gonna live a long life now just knowing i will be in good hands ! thanks for the hugs and prayers girls ! so nice to know you are all still there for me and thinking of me ! hugs and prayers to you all also !

Posts.Content: Aug 12, 2010 07:16AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: hi ! appointment went great. they are so awesome and caring up there. i feel like i am in better hands there. i will have a port placed next week sometime and the braca gene test if insurance will pay. i also have to have a heart ultrasound cause one of the meds can damage the heart. only a 1% chance though. i will have 4 rounds of adriamycin and cytoxan every two weeks and taxol 12 times which is weekly. total of 20 weeks. i will keep you updated. i am hanging in there. its  tough days but some are good. trying to get out and do as much as possible before treatments. dyed my hair red last night. it was fun and i figure i may as well play with it while i have it ! lol ! talk soon ! thanks dmorgan ;-)
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Jun 27, 2010 05:06PM jlynnbain1031 wrote: you guys are great ! thanks so much ! so comforting ! i have thought of a second opinion but i have my surgery on thursday and don't want to wait. i just want it out of there. i have a general surgeon who has been great with me in the past as i had my gallbladder out the hard way and he is just wonderful. i really trust in him and i hope he can do this. do you all recommend i get a breast cancer doctor ? so sorry you all went through this ! its terrible and so scary. i really want a mascetomy cause of my fear of things coming back. boobs are just boobs. and i really don't care about chemo and losing hair. that grows back. just want the cancer gone. love to you both. my faith will get me through !
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Jun 28, 2010 11:46AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: thank you all so very much ! i am so glad i found this. i am really trying to deal but its so hard as you all know. got my hair cut today. thank god my mom is a hairdresser. lol ! also got to see my grandson today so it was a good day. now everyone is gone and my mind is wondering again. got a script for xanax so i will start them tomorrow. think i will take all your advice with the cd's and the breathing and start eating right. i love my chinese. lol. hope i can still eat it from time to time. i think you all are right that once i know what i am dealing with and the treatments start, i will feel more in control. right now i don't feel in control of anything. i almost went really short with my hair but thought no, i may not lose it all. and why start that now. i have long dark hair. those of you that did have chemo, did you lose your hair ? i also heard that some don't these days. hair is minor to me. i think those scarves people wear are cute . lol ! well, i will be back to talk. thanks for all the prayers ! it means so much to me ! <3  also, if any of you had lymph nodes test positive can you explain ? love the lime green pj story !! lol ! lisa1962, i live in st. clairsville oh. about two hours from columbus. my daughter went to hocking college in athens. thanks to each and everyone of you. its awesome that you come back here even after treatment or even with benign to help us all out that are waiting. love and hugs to you all !!!!
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2010 04:34AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: THANK YOU ! I THINK I AM MORE WORRIED ABOUT THE LYMPH NODES THAN ANYTHING. I HOPE THE WIRE NEEDLE IS AS EASY AS THE CORE NEEDLE. IT WAS A BREEZE ! I AM ALSO WORRIED ABOUT GOING UNDER IN SURGERY.. I ALWAYS HAD A FEAR OF THAT ! LOL ! THEY SAID THEY WILL GIVE ME SOMETHING FOR NERVES BEFORE THE SURGERY AS THEY DID IN MY PAST SURGERIES ! YOUR RIGHT, I WILL FEEL ALOT BETTER TOMORROW NIGHT THAN TONIGHT. TONIGHT IS GOING TO BE AGONIZING ! GOING TO HOPE MY XANAX LETS ME SLEEP TONIGHT! THANKS FOR THE PRAYERS ! IT MEANS THE WORLD TO ME ! :-)
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2010 06:13AM - edited Jul 5, 2010 10:16AM by jlynnbain1031 hi gals ! i have been recovering from the surgery. i am doing much better today. had to stop the vicodin, they were making me sick and really weak. tylenol is all i am taking now. hope to hear something about my er/pr tomorrow. so anyway, my morning on thursday started out with the dye injection in the nipple. 5 shots of it with no numbin meds. i thought i would cry but help my composure. it was the worst. then i was off to have the radiologist do both breasts with wires. the numbing was the worst and not bad at all. that part was not near as bad as the first. so i got a room and waiting about 2 hours before they took me to the holding room and prepared me for the OR. one nurse couldn't find a vein for the iv and stuck me and bruised me good then stuck me again right under the wrist. she hit a nerve and now still even, i get tingling in my fingers. ugh! so another nurse came over, thank god, and did it with ease and no pain to me at all ! not even a bruise there today ! so went in or and next thing i was in recovery. my husband snuck back to tell me that the lymph nodes where negative. he was so happy he was crying ! god, i love him ! it was wonderful to get an ounce of good news after bad news for a month ! i was so relieved ! god was with me !!!! now i am just wondering if anyone knows if i will need chemo or not since lymph nodes were not involved. they took three out and all negative ! i know radiation for sure. just hope for no chemo. but if i have to i will still fight and win ! my incisions are pretty big. oh and i also did not even know it but had dcis in the other breast. not sure how they knew that without a biopsy. they had this on my report even before the surgery. the biopsy i did have was on my suspicious right breast. hmmmm ! i don't know ! anyway, just wanted to let you all know i am still recovering but in alot better spirits. if anyone can try to answer my question about the chemo it would be appreciated. thanks for listening to me and thanks so much from all of you for the prayers. the power of prayer is with all of us ! love ya'll !!!
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2010 12:50PM jlynnbain1031 wrote: just wanted to thank you all again for all the stories. these help so much ! thanks dmorgan, i actually even went to my high school reunion this past saturday ! wasn't sure i wanted to go but glad i did ! this waiting stuff is for the birds ! i will finally find out tomorrow what stage and my er/pr. status. hopefully all will be good and all clear margins. anyone know why the insicion site in my right breast where the idc is is still really sore and also i feel a hard golf ball size area where the insicion site is. i will be sure to tell the doc tomorrow but just wondered if this was normal like maybe scar tissue. i am more sore as the days go on. goodluck with everything huntreiter3. i will be thinking of you. sounds like your on top of everything. let us all know how it goes ! PRAYERS ! love to each of you as always ! will get back to ya'll with hopefully good news tomorrow !

Posts.Content: Jul 22, 2010 11:12AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: hi all ! sorry to so long to get back. i took a mini vacation. so nice to get away from reality for even a few days. still on my mind but it was relaxing ! dmorgan..doing well thank you so much my friend ! i am scared but i will just keep on going to appts and listen to docs. not sure if i am ready for bone scans and such. i don't want to know if it spread. i want to deal with one thing at a time here. lol ! i know i say i won't do it but i will. i mean the bone and pet scans. my oncologist appt is for july 29th at 10:00 am. i am sure i will find out more then. thanks terri and barbara. i am so happy you all are doing well ! praying for each and everyone of you every night ! gutsy...it really is great to have all these wonderful women helping us through each stage of this ! so glad i found this site ! sohard....keep us updated. i thought at first i had no nodes positive and they came back and said two were positive. it is so discouraging ! god will take care of us all. i have just found that when i am scared, i talk to god. amp47....your info has helped so much ! thanks again ! i pm you a few minutes ago. thanks to each of you and i will keep you posted ! oh and how about every pain you get you think of spread ! lol ! thats the worst. the waiting sucks too ! lets all just keep truckin on ! its the only way i know how. keep god in your hearts everyday. without him, my family, friends and all of you, i don't know how i would of got this far ! much love, jody !

Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2010 05:42AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: not good news. they thought lymph nodes were negative and two of five came out positive. ugh ! now what. i couldn't even ask him what stage. anyway, it says on report that the staging is ajcc tnm staging is at least pT1c, Pn1a with two lymph nodes metastatic carcinoma. anyone know what stage this is ? also my er/pr are negative. wonderful isn't it ! i really want to give up right now !!! thanks all ! don't know where else to turn !
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Sep 4, 2010 08:40AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: well had my first AC treatment on wed. actually was a little nauseated and got a bad headache and heartburn on wed night but it was ok. next day a little nausea not to much headache again now on day three i feel pretty good except for minor headache. did anyone else have headache from the first treatment. this is definitly doable. i hope they stay this way. i know i am ready to get out of my house but don't want to risk infection yet. one down 4 more AC treatments to go. then my weekly infusions of taxol times 12. hope taxol is doable. so far no bone pain from the neulasta shot yesterday. hope that stays the same too. hugs and prayers to all !
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2010 06:33AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: not to bad. thanks for asking dmorgan :) i go for number 4 tomorrow. the worst of it will be over, then 12 weeks of taxol infusions which i hear are alot easier. i have had some minor headaches and little nausea. on the plus side, no more shaving the legs n armpits for awhile. haha ! my first day i am a little sick but do pretty good after that. i do get tired a bit but nothing to bad. i have been pretty lucky so far ! i get my port next wed. ugh. i am dreading that but if it saves my viens thats great ! will let ya know how tomorrow goes ! talk soon !
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2011 12:35AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: hi. sorry i haven't been here in so long ! i am doing well. i am 7 weeks out of treatment. i had 14 rounds all together. i couldn't finish the last two taxol treatments cause of neoropathy setting in. it is slowly going away though. i am now in between doing radiation vs double mastectomy. i go for genetics on tues. that will help me determine whats next. i get scared of it coming back from time to time but i am just going with the flow and living my life. thanks for thinking of me !!! talk real soon !!!
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2010 02:39AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: thank you all for your kind words and all your thoughts and prayers. i want to answer each one of you personally so much but my mind is not with it these days ! lol ! love to each of you though ! my prayers are always with all of you too ! my zanax is helping somewhat ! thats a plus ! i have learned that it is out of my control and up to god and the doctors now ! I JUST PRAY NO LYMPH NODES ARE INVOLVED ! i know i can do this with all you fine gals ! they are doing the lymph nodes and everything tomorrow ! i will stay the night so hopefully be back hear friday or the weekend to let you all know how it went. surgery is scheduled for 130 tomorrow but i have to be there at 8:30 so they can shoot the dye in me then do the wires in each breast. i have to wait for four hours for the dye to settle. ugh ! oh well, another process. my preop went well yesterday. i had to have juice though cause i almost passed out from them taking blood ! lol ! i have been through 3 c sections, gallbladder operation (the hard way), an an incisional hernia repair and i am afraid of my own blood ! lol ! anyway, i cleaned the house, froze some meals for the kiddos and husband, set up a sitter for today and tomorrow. thanks for each and everyone of your advice. it is comforting that i found this site and all of you ! love ya'll ! going to hang out with some xanax today ! lol !!! each day gets better. :-)
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2

Posts.Content: Jul 7, 2010 06:56AM jlynnbain1031 wrote: thanks again to each one of you ! some very helpful messages ! thank so much ! i called doc today to see if they had my results of my er/pr and they aren't in yet ! geeze ! long time ! i will do whatever they ask me to do. i just want it gone. my doctor, before the surgery, mentioned rads straight to the breast. has anyone ever had this done ? thanks lisa from athens ! my family is thrilled ! happiest news i had in over a month ! yay ! hugs to you from st. c ! thank you dmorgan. it means so much to me that you think of me all the time ! i think of each of you all too ! we are all a sisterhood ! i thank god for this forum ! thank you shelly. i hope my doc is the same way, but, whatever i must do is going to be ok with me ! i will get through. some days are hard! i am just ready for the next step ! again, thanks to all of you for all the support ! it means the world to me ! you all have helped me in so many ways. what exactly are cold caps ? thanks !
